title: When is 7.12 coming out?
body: I really want the new quest system and the yasuo skin but I don't know when it coming out plz comment when it's coming out.

replies.body: I don't have an official date for 7.12 since we don't want to push it out until it's as ready as we can make it. I do believe the first phase of [**Missions **](http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2017/05/dev-on-missions/) will start with 7.12, but keep in mind this could all change since it's not 100% set in stone yet.
I could give a date, but there's a pretty good chance that estimation would be wrong since patches could drop between Tuesday-Friday. That's about a 25% chance of my guess being right =\ .
so will it be next week tuesday - friday then? thanks
as far as i know theres no official date, but unless E3 or something is delaying it, it'll probably be out the 14th(which is the day after my birthday :P) but dont quote me on that
7.12 is here.... and what with it?? nothing.. where is my riven skin?
the new patch will come tomorrow {{champion:157}}
But will the yasuo and riven skins be realesed in patch 7.12?
Usually it's like, every two weeks. But sometimes it goes for longer.
